title: Educational Technology Integration Design Workshop Based on Adult Learning Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in educational technology tools, experience in adult learner education
context.additional_context: A learner group comprising professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields. Provided with digital devices (laptops/tablets).

learning_goals: Learners can apply the core principles of four major adult learning theories (connectivism, constructivism, cognitivism, behaviorism) to actual instructional design.
Learners can develop blended learning designs utilizing digital tools (video conferencing platforms, collaborative software).
Learners can create a decision-making model for selecting theory-based educational strategies based on learner analysis data.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
